meta.article_title: September 26, 2011 - Develop Your Game Around Your Playing Style

develop-your-game-around-your-playing-st.probleme: Develop Your Game Around Your Playing Style

debutant.description: See my article on Develop the Basics in the How to Be a Champion articles.

exercices_complementaires.description: Develop a loop against backspin, incorporating what you learn from watching players with similar styles.

metriques_progression.rep: Develop an over-powering strength, something that will dominate at whatever level you are at, and develop a style around that strength.
